actions.message:
__***LIVE BOT STATUS: ONLINE - ALL SERVICES ARE RUNNING***__ 

__***Bot Prefix:***__  `${tempVars("prefix")}`

__***Server Count:***__  `${tempVars("guildcount")}`


__***Members:***__  `${tempVars("usercount")}`


__***Voice Connections:***__  `${tempVars("voice channels")}`


__***Bot Uptime Since Last Restart:***__  -  `${tempVars("sendMessage")}`


__***Ping***__  -  `${tempVars("Ping")}`


__***Ram Usage MB***__  -  `${tempVars("Ram")}`

`${tempVars("guildnames")}`
